NewsItem.HEADLINE: The Wireless Edge: Edge Computing 2018
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A description of edge computing trends and analysis of the cost/benefit to place EC resources in the radio, at a regional data center, or centralized.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT:
This report expands on the original concept of Mobile Edge Computing (MEC) and Multi-Access Edge Computing to illustrate how latency plays a role in various applications and revenue opportunities for operators.
Economic analysis weighs the cost of Edge Computing in every radio (with the best possible latency) against the revenue opportunities dependent on low latency. Is it worthwhile to put computing at the very edge, or is there a more optimal solution?? Analysis of multiple applications illustrates a likely outcome of this optimization question for typical operators.
A five-year forecast is included for services, hardware and software related to Edge Computing.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: MEC mobile edge computing multi-access edge computing latency forecast ec
